forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 66, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. North northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
